      • intToLong

        public static java.lang.Long intToLong(java.lang.Object obj)
        If object is an Integer then it is converted to long. Otherwise object is cast to Long. If the object is not either Integer or Long, a ClassCastException will be raised.
        Parameters:
        obj - object to transform to long
        Returns:
        long value
